long_description: Help keep your bike secure with the Blackburn Angola Cable lock, which offers key-operated convenience and a 12mm-thick, Kevlar(R) encased cable for good protection. Kevlar sheath encases the braided steel cable for increased cut-resistance over plain steel cable; sheath also helps protect the bike's finish. Locking mechanism is both bump-proof and pick-proof for high levels of security. The Blackburn Angola Cable lock comes with 3 laser-cut keys.
short_description: Help keep your bike secure with the Blackburn Angola Cable lock, which offers key-operated convenience and a 12mm-thick, Kevlar(R) encased cable for good protection.
